==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じゅつ|k1=じゅっ|かい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しゅっかい'}} {{m|ltc|述懷}} ({{IPAchar|/zywit hwɛj/}}). Compare modern simplified {{cog|cmn|述怀|tr=shùhuái}}. Read as ''shukkai'' until the [[w:Edo_period|Edo period]].

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[d͡ʑɯᵝkːa̠i]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じゅっかい|kyu=述懷}}

# an [[expression]] of one's [[thought]]s or [[recollections]], an [[opinion]]
# a [[complaint]] about [[unfairness]] or [[dissatisfaction]]

====Derived terms====
* {{l|ja|述懐奉公|tr={{l|ja|じゅっかいぼうこう}}, ''{{l|ja|sc=Latn|jukkai bōkō}}''}}: [[service]] or [[employment]] while [[harbor]]ing complaints

====Idioms====
* {{lang|ja|述懐}}{{l|ja|身}}{{l|ja|を}}{{l|ja|待つ|待たず}} ({{lang|ja|じゅっかいみをまたず}}, ''jukkai mi o matazu''); {{l|ja|述懐奉公}}{{l|ja|身}}{{l|ja|を}}{{l|ja|待つ|待たず}} ({{lang|ja|じゅっかいぼうこうみをまたず}}, ''jukkai bōkō mi o matazu''): "complaints about unfairness don't wait for one's body" ⇒ if one continues to work while unhappy about it, one's work suffers, and it may ultimately lead to losing one's [[health]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|じゅっかい|kyu=述懷}}

# to [[express]] one's [[thought]]s, to [[reminisce]], to [[opine]]
# to [[complain]] about [[unfairness]] or [[dissatisfaction]]
